titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the arrival at Bushire of the Duffadar (person in charge of a small group of troops) and sixteen Suwars (horsemen), discussing arrangements for their onward travel to Bombay, and arrangements for both their pay and the muleteer who accompanied them.The letter also discusses the actions of the Jemidar who had taken five troopers and gone on an unauthorised pilgrimage to Kerballa [KarbalƒÅ] instead of travelling directly to Bushire; and financial arrangements arising out of the unauthorised excursion.
